name: ChatGPT
description: A powerful conversational AI model by OpenAI capable of generating human-like text, answering questions, writing code, and more.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google's multimodal AI model designed to understand and process text, images, audio, and video for advanced reasoning and conversation.

name: Midjourney
description: An AI image generator that creates highly artistic and detailed images from textual prompts, accessed via Discord.

name: Jasper
description: An AI content platform that helps marketing and sales teams create high-quality copy for ads, emails, blogs, and more.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: An AI pair programmer that provides code suggestions and completions directly in your code editor.

name: Runway
description: An AI-powered suite of creative tools for video editing, including text-to-video generation, motion tracking, and background removal.

name: Suno AI
description: An AI music generator that creates full songs, including lyrics, instruments, and vocals, from simple text prompts.

name: Perplexity AI
description: A conversational AI search engine that provides direct answers to questions with citations and sources from the web.

name: Claude
description: An AI assistant from Anthropic focused on helpful, harmless, and honest conversations, ideal for summarization and creative writing.

name: Synthesia
description: An AI video generation platform that creates professional videos with realistic AI avatars, eliminating the need for cameras.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI-powered text-to-speech (TTS) and voice cloning software for creating natural-sounding audio in multiple languages.

name: Notion AI
description: AI features integrated directly into the Notion workspace to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and improve writing.

name: Grammarly
description: An AI-powered writing assistant that checks grammar, spelling, punctuation, clarity, and tone across various platforms.

name: Canva Magic Studio
description: A suite of AI-powered design tools within Canva that can generate images, videos, presentations, and copy automatically.

name: Tome
description: An AI-powered presentation and storytelling tool that helps generate entire narratives and slides from a single prompt.

name: DALL-E 3
description: OpenAI's advanced text-to-image model that generates highly detailed and contextually accurate images from descriptions.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: An AI assistant that joins your meetings to transcribe, summarize, and analyze voice conversations.

name: Descript
description: An all-in-one audio and video editor that uses AI to make editing as simple as editing a text document.

name: Copy.ai
description: An AI copywriter that generates content for marketing, sales, blogs, and social media.

name: Writesonic
description: An AI writer for creating SEO-optimized, plagiarism-free articles, ads, emails, and website copy.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: A foundational open-source text-to-image model by Stability AI that allows for extensive customization and control.

name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe's family of creative generative AI models, designed to be commercially safe and integrated into Adobe's suite of apps.

name: HeyGen
description: An AI video platform specializing in creating realistic talking avatars, video translation, and voice cloning.

name: Pika Labs
description: An AI video platform that can generate and edit videos in various styles from text and image prompts.

name: QuillBot
description: An AI-powered writing tool that functions as a paraphraser, summarizer, grammar checker, and citation generator.

name: Otter.ai
description: An AI meeting assistant that provides real-time transcription, automated summaries, and identifiable speaker notes.

name: Elicit
description: An AI research assistant that helps automate literature reviews by finding relevant papers and summarizing key information.

name: Surfer SEO
description: An AI-driven content intelligence tool that helps you write, optimize, and rank articles on search engines.

name: Zapier
description: An automation platform that connects thousands of apps. Its AI features allow for the creation of more intelligent automated workflows.

name: Leonardo.Ai
description: A platform for generating high-quality game assets, concept art, and illustrations using a variety of fine-tuned AI models.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: Microsoft's branding for its AI assistant, integrated into Windows, Microsoft 365, and Edge to provide smart assistance.

name: Gamma
description: An AI tool for creating engaging presentations, documents, and webpages from text prompts, focusing on beautiful design.

name: Cursor
description: An AI-first code editor built from the ground up to help developers write, edit, and debug code faster with deep AI integration.

name: Beautiful.ai
description: An AI presentation maker that automatically applies design principles to create professional-looking slides in minutes.

name: Udio
description: An emerging AI music creation tool that generates high-quality, full-length songs with vocals from text prompts.

name: Ideogram
description: An AI image generator that excels at creating images with coherent and reliable text, a common challenge for other models.

name: InVideo AI
description: An AI video generation tool that creates a publish-ready video from a single text prompt, complete with script, media, and voiceover.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: An AI coding assistant integrated into the Replit online IDE, offering code generation, completion, and explanation.

name: Humata AI
description: An AI platform that acts as a chatbot for your files, allowing you to ask questions and get summarized answers from any document.

name: Adobe Podcast
description: An AI-powered web-based tool for recording and editing audio, featuring a flagship 'Enhance Speech' function to remove background noise.

name: Rytr
description: An AI writing assistant that helps you generate high-quality content for blogs, emails, and social media in just a few seconds.

name: Tabnine
description: An AI code completion assistant that works in your favorite IDE to predict and suggest the next lines of code.

name: Pictory
description: An AI video creator that automatically transforms long-form content like blogs, webinars, and podcasts into short, shareable videos.

name: Semrush
description: A comprehensive SEO and marketing toolkit that has integrated AI features for content strategy, keyword research, and competitor analysis.

name: Make.com
description: A powerful visual automation platform that allows you to connect apps and automate workflows using a drag-and-drop interface.

name: Consensus
description: An AI-powered search engine for scientific research that extracts and distills findings directly from published papers.

name: AIVA
description: An AI Music Generation Assistant that helps create original compositions and soundtracks in various genres and styles.

name: Figma
description: A leading collaborative design tool that has incorporated AI features like Jambot to help automate brainstorming and diagramming.

name: Julius AI
description: An AI data analyst that allows you to chat with your data to analyze spreadsheets, create charts, and uncover insights.

name: Frase.io
description: An AI tool that helps content creators research, write, and optimize articles for better SEO performance.
